mapper.sql: select id, parent_id, name, url, code, type, sort, create_time, update_time, is_deleted from acl_permission
mapper.select: select ap.* from acl_admin_role aar left join acl_role_permission arp on aar.role_id=arp.role_id left join acl_permission ap on arp.permission_id=ap.id where aar.admin_id=#{adminId} and aar.is_deleted=0 and arp.is_deleted=0 and ap.is_deleted=0 and ap.type=1 order by ap.sort
